channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Drones pose increasing risk to airliners near major US airports
item.description: An Associated Press analysis of an aviation safety database reveals that drones last year accounted for nearly two-thirds of reported near midair collisions involving commercial aircraft taking off and landing at major U.S. airports.

item.title: 60,000 Americans to lose their rental assistance and risk eviction unless Congress acts
Secondhand stores are poised to benefit if US tariffs drive up new clothing costs
